Articles.Content:
No I'm an underachiever

press the the button get a cookie

Heck yeah! Who wouldn't?

Press the button to have a better computer but to not be able to run Kerbal Space Program...

ill press it. i dont play much these days...

press the button for infinite money but you can only buy cars with said money

*BOOP*.

I'll just buy other stuff with cars instead of money c^:

Press this button to have an alpaca in your house.

No I don't whant to be stabbed

press the the button get a 20 year old dog

I press it because I know the dog will die soon so I give it a comfortable last few days on Earth.

Press the button to go on the Endurance into a wormhole.

hmm... NAH! the wormhole would collapse as soon as endurance enters it.

press the button to have infinite money but it can only go towards funding for NASA/ESA

Yes

press the button hitler dies early buuuuuut every invention from World War Two disappears

Yes

press the button hitler dies early buuuuuut every invention from World War Two disappears

No because as horrible as it was in the end many good things came out of it.

press the buttonÃ¢â‚¬Â¦Kerbpaint mod is added to KSPÃ¢â‚¬Â¦but update 1.0 is delayed another 2 months

No, because then the hype train would derail, and not be rerailed until a few hours before release.

Press for pizza... with the cheese in a pattern making it look like the face of an animatronic from FNAF. (Not a fan of FNAF, by the way.)

Nope. I hate FNAF.

Organ & orchestra but you can only play Interstellar's theme on it.

You mean I can fall asleep on it? Meh, I got my bed for sleeping.

Push the button to gain $5000, but lose a friend.

Yes I will. I will hav -1 friend!

Push button to get infinate reputation at the expence of one of your best ksp ship!

Edited April 19, 2015 by Joshwoo69

No. My ship is better than unlimited rep. (Not to brag.)

Get 1 dollar. It is outdated.

No. My ship is better than unlimited rep. (Not to brag.)

Get 1 dollar. It is outdated.

Push it. I can sell it to a collector.

You can have $2 Billion, but you live in the Cupcakes (My little Pony fanfic) univese, and Pinkamena has your number....
Where can i find this universe? Also yes. I will press it.

I will not press the button, since you did not specify what for.

Press for infinite tacos, but they all only have cheese, nothing else.

I wouldn't press it; meat is the best part of a taco.

Press the button and get a new epic gaming computer, but you can only play Super Mario 64 on it.

Sure. I don't lose anything.

Press the button to receive an iPod, but you can only listen to

Nope. I hate FNAF.

I AM NOT ALONE , YAY

-------------------------------------

Response to actual game:

I'd press it.

Push the button for better internet, however you'll only be able to watch Ratboy Genius's videos.

Sure. I don't lose anything.

Press the button to receive an iPod, but you can only listen to

No thanks. Why would I want an iPod?

A trip to Mars. On Mars One.

I'd accept it.

Since nobody responded to my button, I'll post it again:

Push the button for better internet, however you'll only be able to watch Ratboy Genius's videos.

Better internet speed? For a huge limitation on content? Absolutley not.

Push the button for universal free gasoline.

No. I don't press the button. Because that's communism.

Push the button for a KSP .13.3.

No. I don't press the button. Because that's communism.

And communism is intrinsicly bad because..?
